newsitem.title: USA: Municipal sales to total $1.2 bln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Municipal sales to total $1.2 bln for Thursday.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales are expected to total $1.2 billion in 30 offerings for Thursday, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $368 million in 20 issues. The largest issue is a $78.5 million Virginia housing bond deal at 1100 EST.
Negotiated sales total $809 million in 10 offerings. The largest is a $300 million Alameda County, Calif., deal through MR Beal & Co.
An additional $91 million of negotiated deals in five offerings are on the possible sales calendar, meaning underwriters have said they may price them Thursday depending on market conditions.
